116.content: What shall we do when we find a shortage in the shipment ?
You should do one of the two things - either to lodge a claim with the shipowner or with the insurance company .
Shall we leave it to the brokers ?
Yes, generally they do. It's usually included in their brokerage commission, but it's always best to clarify this upfront.
Is it the same in America ?
That's a good question. It can be a bit different in America.
It's part of their service , isn't it ?
Generally, yes, handling claims for shortages  considered part of a US broker's service.
Is it enough to claim with an on board bill of lading ?
Not necessarily. While an on-board bill of lading is important proof of shipment, it's often not  to successfully claim a shortage.
I see . By the way , how do we prove the ownership of our goods ?
Proving ownership can be a bit complex, but here are the key documents you'll need, depending on the specifics of the sale and shipment: * This is the primary

516.content: After I am accepted for unemployment benefits , what will happen next ?
You will receive a Notice of Unemployment Insurance Award letter .

Yes, likely. After receiving your Award Letter, you'll need to certify for benefits every two weeks.

You'll need to confirm you were able and available to work during the weeks you're claiming, and that you actively sought work (if required in your state - some states have work search requirements

Yes, typically. Besides confirming availability and work search , you'll usually need to report any earnings you had during those two weeks.

557.content: What's the climate like in your country ?
What's the weather like in spring ?
In spring, the weather in Greece is generally mild and sunny. You can expect average temperatures between 15-25°C .
Summer in Greece is hot and dry, with plenty of sunshine! Temperatures typically range from 28-35°C, but can often climb higher, especially in July and August.
Is it cold or warm in autumn ?
Autumn in Greece is wonderfully warm and mild, a lovely time to visit! The temperatures gradually cool down from the summer heat, averaging around 20-28°C in September and October.
Is it very cold in winter ?
It depends where in Greece you are! Generally, winters are mild, especially in the islands and coastal areas. Temperatures usually stay between 10-18°C.

58.content: Hello . Excuse me .
Yes . Can I help you ?
Do you remember me ? I just had lunch here a half hour ago .
Of course I remember you .
I think I lost my wallet here .
Oh no! I'm so sorry to hear that. Let's see if we can find it. Do you remember where you were sitting?
Really ? You didn't find a wallet ?
We haven't found a wallet . We were hoping you might remember where you were sitting so we could check that area specifically.
Yes , I would . It's not here . And it's not on the floor.Has anyone sat at this table since we left ?
Let me check with the team. Just one moment...  Yes, someone did sit at your table about fifteen minutes ago.
Hmm . I don't know how it could have happened .
It's certainly frustrating. We'll ask the staff who was seated there if they noticed anything. Do you remember what your wallet looks like? Any distinguishing features?
No . My friend did .
Okay. Do you happen to have your friend's number? We could give them a call and ask for a description.
No , I'm not sure . But I usually take out my wallet when I sit down.It ' s uncomfortable to sit on it . So I usually put it next to me on the table .
That's helpful to know. We'll thoroughly check the area around the table again, and ask the staff who sat there if they noticed anything near where you usually place your wallet.
I don't think it's at home . I think I had it when I left the house.But what should I do ?
That's a good point, knowing you had it when you left home narrows things down. Okay, let's think through this. First, we'll continue searching here.
Should I call the police ?
That's a good question. It might be a bit premature to call the police , but it's certainly something to consider if we don't locate it soon.
Hmm . I'll go home and check . Maybe you're right . Maybe it's at home .
That sounds like a good plan. It's easy to overlook things sometimes.
Thanks for your help .

637.content: Oh , my God ! I've been cheated !

I wanted to . But he said , no , the box is still in its plastic wrap from the store.If it's opened , other people won't believe it's new .
That's a classic tactic! He was trying to create a sense of urgency and legitimacy. He really played on your hope for a good deal. That's incredibly frustrating.
Yes , it was the kind of perfect plastic wrap that comes with new products.Look , it even had a bar-code price sticker on it ! It looked brand new .
Wow, he really went all out with the deception. A barcode sticker! That's brazen. It sounds like he's done this before and is quite good at it.
He said he had to get rid of them . They were stolen .
That's what he , of course. It was a way to explain the incredibly low price and pressure you into buying it quickly, without thinking too much about it.
C'mon , don't blame me ! I thought it was a new camera . We could use it.We were even thinking about buying a camera . I don't understand how he could have such a perfect-looking box .

71.content: Just as the saying goes , every potter praises his own pot . You should pay special attention to selling yourself properly in the interview .
It is especially important for the graduates who step into the job market for the first time .
You'd better prepare what you are going to say in advance , in order to have a good performance in the interview .
The contents should be mainly descriptions of your background . And the length depends on the particular situation .
Only when you are aware of what the interviewer will be interested in , can you make a targeted preparation .
Exactly! Researching the company and the role is key.
Selling yourself should go straight to the point , and the statement should be clear and brief .

Absolutely. Rambling can lose the interviewer's attention. Think impactful summaries rather than long stories. What specific areas do you think graduates often struggle with when trying to be concise?
You should particularly state your strong points which are closely related to the position you are applying for .
That's a crucial point. It's not just  strong points, but  them directly to the job requirements.
Time permitted , you could add certain examples to your description .
Yes, examples are fantastic! They move you from  the interviewer you have a skill to  them. It makes your claims much more believable and memorable.

A 10 % commission will not leave us much .

857.content: what happened ? Why didn't he win ?

They are! And he was. This was a routine post-competition test. The rules are pretty strict, even for substances not directly related to performance enhancement.
that's so disappointing . I don't know why top athletes would feel the need to take drugs .
It's a complex issue. Some athletes feel immense pressure to perform, and unfortunately, some turn to substances to cope with stress or anxiety.
regardless of how much pressure you're under , there's never a good reason to take drugs .

96.content: How does the political system work in your country ?
We have hundreds of constituencies and the voters in each one elect a member of parliament . Most people call them mp ’ s .
Each mp belongs to a political party , right ?

Almost all of them do . A few are independent . That means that they do not belong to a party . If one party more than half of the mp ’ s . they form a government . That means that they choose a prime Finist
Ah, good question! The cabinet is a group of senior members of parliament chosen by the Prime Minister. They each head a government department – like health, education, or finance.
Can any mp make a law ?
Technically, yes! Any MP can  a law, which is called a Bill. However, it’s a long and complicated process.
I suppose a proposed a law needs the support of the big political parties .
You’re absolutely right. It’s very difficult for a Bill to become law without the support of the major parties.
How do people choose which party or candidate to vote for ?
That's a big question! People consider lots of different things.
